TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebHeartbeatEvent extends System.Web.Management.WebManagementEvent

summary.span: 定義定期引發的健康監視事件。

span.span: Defines those health-monitoring events raised at a periodic interval.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 健康監視，可讓管理已部署的 Web 應用程式的生產環境和作業人員。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空間包含負責封裝應用程式健全狀況狀態資料和負責處理此資料提供者類型的健全狀況事件型別。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它也會包含有助於管理健全狀況事件的支援型別。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 活動訊號健全狀況監視事件做為 ASP.NET 健康監視系統計時器。The heartbeat health-monitoring events serve as a timer for the ASP.NET health-monitoring system. 其所定義的間隔引發`heartBeatInterval`屬性`healthMonitoring`組態區段。They are raised at an interval defined by the `heartBeatInterval` attribute of the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 使用類別來取得處理程序資訊。The uses the class to obtain process information. > [!NOTE] > 在大部分情況下您將能夠實作時，使用 ASP.NET 健康監視類型，而您會藉由指定的值控制健全狀況監視系統`healthMonitoring`組態區段。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 您也可以衍生自健全狀況監視類型的類型來建立您自己的自訂事件和提供者。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. ## Examples 下列組態檔摘錄顯示之組態讓它可以處理活動訊號健全狀況事件。The following configuration file excerpt shows the configuration for the so it can handle heartbeat health events. > [!NOTE] > 和預設會設定要監視的活動訊號健全狀況事件類型。The and the heartbeat health event types to monitor are configured by default. 唯一要做的事情是定義要監視的活動訊號健全狀況事件的規則。The only thing you need to do is to define the rule to monitor the heartbeat health events. 請記得根據預設只有失敗會記錄稽核。Remember that by default only the failure audits are logged. ``` ```
